channel.title: Craft - Digg
channel.description: Craft on Digg: the best articles, videos, tweets, and original content that the web is talking about right now

item.title: Genius Designed A Basketball Hoop Where The Ball Always Goes In
item.description: A YouTuber wrote some software to come up with the most optimal basketball backboard possible and then built it.

item.title: A Computer Whiz Jerry-Rigged A 1930 Model 15 Teletype As A Linux Terminal And It's Quite Impressive
item.description: An extremely patient techie set up a 1930s teletype to be used as a Linux TTY interface.
item.kicker: SOMEONE SEND THIS TO TOM HANKS

item.title: Watching This Milling Machine Carve A Miniature Topographic Map Of Mount Rainier Out Of Aluminum Is Oddly Satisfying
item.description: Witness the mighty power of the Desktop PCB Milling Machine as it wittles an aluminum cube into a replica of Mount Rainier.
item.kicker: MAKING A MOUNTAIN OUT OF A MOLEHILL

item.title: YouTuber Builds DIY Water Coolant To Help Prevent The World's Brightest LED From Burning Out
item.description: Matt from DIY Perks constructs a genius water coolant from scratch to help regulate the power of this 1500 watt LED.

item.title: YouTuber Finds A Great Use For His Quarantine Time And Builds The Ultimate Cat Castle
item.description: An English YouTuber Half-Asleep Chris built his cat a house fit for a king.

item.title: Inventor Builds 'The Highcycle' — A Vehicle Perfectly Suited For Social Distancing
item.description: Colin Furze develops a perfect mode of transportation for these health-conscious times.

item.title: If You Can't Sew, Get A Face Mask On Etsy
item.description: The CDC has recommended you wear a face mask in public. Here are a few from Etsy to order if you can't make your own.

item.title: Outdoor Survivalist Reveals A MacGyver-Like Technique To Catching A Fish With A Mouse Trap
item.description: Canadian outdoor recreationalist Greg Ovens demonstrates a curious method for hooking trout.
item.kicker: MORE THAN ONE WAY TO CATCH A FISH

item.title: Man Takes An Old Rusty Antique Oil Lamp And Restores It To Its Former Glory
item.description: A man finds an old decrepit lamp and meticulously restores it.

item.title: Everything You Need To Know About Making Your Own Face Mask
item.description: A homemade mask isn't a perfect substitute for a medical-grade one, but it could be a good alternative.

item.title: Mad Scientist YouTuber Creates Petrified Lightning Using A Welder And Steel Balls
item.description: Kevin Kohler took a big bowl of steel shot blasting balls and blasted it with electricity.

item.title: Watch This Professional Card Stacker Build Impossibly High Skyscrapers Out Of Playing Cards
item.description: The Guinness World Record holder for Tallest House of Cards Bryan Berg explains how he got so good at stacking cards.

item.title: Lock-Picking Expert Easily Foils This Electronic Keypad Cam Lock In Under A Second
item.description: The LockPickingLawyer is given another challenge and easily picks a unique locking system.

item.title: Meet The Guy Who Makes All The Swords For Hollywood
item.description: Tony Swatton talks about his career being the blacksmith of the stars.

item.title: How To Build A Motorized Drift Trike With Really Basic Tools
item.description: Colin Furze gives an explainer on a fun how-to activity to do in your garage.

item.title: YouTuber Gets Design Team To Build Him Real-Life Web Slingers Like From 'Spider-Man'
item.description: With help from a grappling hook gun glove, James Hobson attempts to web sling in real life.

item.title: How To Build A DIY Carbon Filament Light Bulb From Scratch
item.description: Ben Cusick recreates the steps that Thomas Edison did to make an old school light bulb.

item.title: Man Creates A Glider Airplane That Flies 'Infinitely'
item.description: Thanks to the ingenious design of the airplane, you can technically fly the airplane infinitely as long as you're behind to guide it.

item.title: Extremely Patient Artisan Carves A Toyota Land Cruiser Masterfully Out Of Wood
item.description: The proprietor of the Woodworking Art YouTube channel exhibited exquisite patience and skill in this woodworking art.

item.title: YouTuber Discovers The Secret To Roasting The Perfect Marshmallow
item.description: Nate Bonham demonstrates how to get your marshmallows perfectly toasted.

item.title: This Guy Built An Off-Road Monster Truck Limo And It's Every Tree Hugger's Worst Nightmare
item.description: Jordon Foster dubbed this monstrosity the USS Compensator, an off-road monster limousine.
item.kicker: DON'T ASK HOW MANY MILES PER GALLON IT GETS

item.title: YouTuber Fully Restores This Destroyed 'Space Invaders' Handheld Video Game Console From The 1980s To Its Former Glory
item.description: A restorationist unearths this dead Space Invaders Handheld Arcade Game from the 1980s and takes great pleasure in bringing it back to life.
item.kicker: ALL IT NEEDED WAS A LITTLE LOVE

item.title: Jewelry. Candles. Hand Sanitizer. Welcome To Coronavirus Etsy
item.description: On the online marketplace more often associated with handmade and vintage goods, sellers are pivoting to meet pandemic-related demands.

item.title: Watch These Guys Build A Miniature Remote Control World War II Tank That Fires Cheese Puffs
item.description: These YouTubers have a blast creating this tiny DIY tank from scratch and take it out for a test spin on a golf course.

item.title: How To Build Your Own Quarantine Pool Table
item.description: Rollie Williams, sick of being cooped up during quarantine, builds a DIY pool table out of household items.
item.kicker: WE NEED TO CHALK ABOUT IT

item.title: This Man Building A Turtle Ramp Is The Most Wholesome Thing You'll See Today
item.description: Amid all the stressful news going on, here's a delightful video from Kyle Naegeli — building a special ramp so turtles can easily get out of the pond.

item.title: Wacky Inventor Builds The Ultimate Coronavirus Isolation Box That Will Protect You Until This Whole Thing Blows Over
item.description: Colin Furze invents a special isolation chamber with all the modern creature comforts to keep you entertained until we're allowed to go outside again.

item.title: YouTuber Attempts To Cross The World's Hottest Lake In A Homemade Ice Boat
item.description: Ryan Trahan spent three months building a 4,000 pound boat made out of ice and attempt to sail the length of the world's hottest lake.
item.kicker: 'I DON'T KNOW WHAT I'M DOING EITHER'

item.title: YouTuber Makes A Bicycle With 'Invisible' Wheels
item.description: A savvy mechanic devised a unique bicycle design by building transparent wheels.

item.title: Extreme Sports Enthusiasts Purchase A $5 Snow Sled And Transform It Into A DIY Remote Controlled Expedition Vehicle
item.description: Two YouTubers built an ATV out of a cheap plastic sled and have the time of their lives.

item.title: YouTuber Builds The World's Most Powerful Handheld Laser Pointer
item.description: YouTuber styropyro built a ridiculously powerful laser in his garage and tests it out.

item.title: YouTuber Invents Utility Belt For Avoiding The Coronavirus That Follows All Of The CDC Guidelines
item.description: Matty Benedetto has come up with a lot of clever inventions but this one's got to top them all.

item.title: YouTuber Builds The World's Smallest Micro Submarine And Has The Time Of His Life
item.description: Peter Sripol straps two motors to what he claims is the world's tiniest micro submarine and has a blast.

item.title: How To Make A Synthetic Ruby From Scratch In A Workshop
item.description: A YouTube demonstrates the process for making synthetic rubies with an arc welder.

item.title: Guy Builds A Complete Diablo Statue From Scratch With Just A 3D Pen
item.description: "Just work hard for 3 weeks and buy one instead," he jokes. "It's better for your mental health."
item.kicker: THIS IS GONNA TAKE A WHILE

item.title: This Traditional Japanese Koto Is An Exquisite Work Of Craftsmanship
item.description: The making of a Koto Fukuyama, a 13-stringed harp-like instrument, is a very involved process

item.title: Man Finds A Toyota Supra Abandoned In A Field And Makes It Look Like A Million Bucks
item.description: Watch a destroyed Toyota Supra get fully restored to its former glory. The entire process, which took two years, got condensed into 10 minutes.

item.title: Meet Japan's Master Samurai Sword Maker
item.description: Yuya Nakanishi is renowned for being one of the most proficient sword makers in Japan. Here's a behind-the-scenes tour of how he produces these exquisite blades.

item.title: How To Start A Fire Using Just Your Bare Hands When You're Lost In The Wilderness
item.description: If you happen to be lost in the wilderness, like Brian from the book "Hatchet," it's useful to have some survival skills, like learning how to make fire without tools.

item.title: Man Builds Playing Card Machine Gun Out Of Legos And Has The Time Of His Life
item.description: A Finnish YouTuber on the Brick Experiment Channel creates a LEGO machine gun that shoots playing cards.

item.title: Man Builds A Space Rocket Out Of 1 Million Matches And Lights It
item.description: A YouTuber shows the many hours it took to build a space rocket made entirely out of matches — only to quickly watch it burn into oblivion after a few short minutes.
item.kicker: SOME PEOPLE WANT TO WATCH THE WORLD BURN

item.title: YouTuber Builds Miniature Working Lumber Mill Completely Out Of Legos
item.description: A resourceful LEGO fan built a fully functional custom built Firewood Factory.

item.title: Guy Converted His Volkswagen Passat To Electric By Himself 10 Years Ago. Here's How He Pulled Off The Complicated Process
item.description: Before you could buy an electric car, you had to build one. A YouTuber explains, after 90,000 miles on the road, how he built his homebrew EV.

item.title: YouTuber Attempts To Sharpen 'Impossible To Sharpen' Ceramic Knife
item.description: A YouTuber demonstrates why ceramic knives are super difficult to sharpen on traditional knife sharpening stones — and how, against all odds, he got his sharpened.
item.kicker: NOT THE SHARPEST TOOL IN THE SHED

item.title: Watch This Rusty Old Hammer Get Impeccably Restored To Look Like New
item.description: A man takes an old and rusty broken hammer from his uncle and gives it an extraordinary restoration.

item.title: 'Mythbusters' Host Adam Savage Built A Rickshaw And Had Boston Dynamics' 'Spot' Pull Him Around
item.description: Adam Savage came up with the greatest slacker application for Spot: pulling him around.

item.title: YouTuber Shows How The Ancient Egyptians Used Rudimentary DIY Tools To Build The Pyramids
item.description: The team at How To Make Everything demonstrates how the Pyramids were built by making the tools they would have used completely by hand.

item.title: Man Masterfully Restores A $2 Junk Game Boy Color To Beautiful Working Condition
item.description: "The console was sold as junk and for spares but pretty much everything except the speaker is broken. The mother board doesn't power on. The shell is badly yellowed. Stickers are in terrible condition and the screen is badly burned."

item.title: Inspired By 'The Dark Knight,' Man Turns Entire Ceiling Into Giant Light Panel
item.description: Let there be light — lots and lots of it.

item.title: YouTuber Demonstrates How To Make New Crayons Out Of Recycling Broken Old Crayons
item.description: A YouTuber gives a helpful how-to on how to make new crayons.
